# PED::SET_PED_ALTERNATE_WALK_ANIM

## Summary
Swaps the peds straight forward walking anim with the specified anim a new one

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **STRING** animDictionary: The name of the dictionary the anim is in
* **STRING** anim: The name of the anim to use
* **FLOAT** blendDelta = 8: A float value specifying how fast the anim should blend in if the ped is already walking around
* **BOOL** looped = true: Whether or not the walk anim should play once and then end, or loop until CLEAR_PED_ALTERNATE_WALK_ANIM is called

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Specifies a new walking animation to use when the ped is walking around

Full list of animation dictionaries and anims by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/animDictsCompact.json

Full list of movement clipsets by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/movementClipsetsCompact.json
